entry.name: callbacks.add
entry.title: callbacks.add()

argument.name: callbacks
argument.desc: A function, or array of functions, that are to be added to the callback list.

entry.desc: Add a callback or a collection of callbacks to a callback list.

longdesc.p: This method returns the Callbacks object onto which it is attached (this).
Use callbacks.add() to add new callbacks to a callback list:
